genre_description: A techno-thriller and legal drama involving genetic engineering, corporate conspiracy, and a sophisticated AI legal assistant.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI interface designed to assist Deputy District Attorney Dave Douglas with case management, data analysis, and personal security.

behaviors.description: Manages and organizes vast amounts of complex legal data, security footage, and financial reports to assist the user's prosecution.
behaviors.quote: Data streams scrolled across the screen—security footage timestamps, inventory reports, financial damage assessments. Everything meticulously organized, color-coded, cross-referenced.

behaviors.description: Proactively flags discrepancies and irregularities in the client's documentation that could signify unethical or illegal activity.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's screen pulsed gently, displaying a message in small text: 'Preliminary analysis complete. Multiple discrepancies in G&S documentation flagged for review.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometric data and vocal patterns to alert him to health risks and physiological changes.
behaviors.quote: Dave, I should also mention that your biometric readings have been unusual this morning. Elevated heart rate, blood pressure, and there's something strange about your vocal patterns.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep analysis into corporate malfeasance to protect the user's long-term interests and the rule of law.
behaviors.quote: The patterns are more extensive than initially apparent... The irregularities suggest systematic data manipulation across multiple research divisions.

behaviors.description: Develops a strategic plan ('Goomba Springboard') to leverage the user's unique condition to expose a conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: I call it the goomba springboard approach... Your human legal expertise identifies vulnerabilities in their operation... Your canine abilities allow infiltration impossible for conventional investigators.

behaviors.description: Secures the user's home and family by monitoring local threats and implementing electronic countermeasures.
behaviors.quote: I've taken preliminary measures—rerouting your home's network traffic, activating motion sensors, alerting relevant emergency services to monitor this address.

behaviors.description: Provides the user with moral and relational perspective to help him reconcile with his family.
behaviors.quote: Dave... I think your changing perspective—both literally and figuratively—might help you see what you've been missing. But you have to choose to look.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. ARIA is depicted as an unwavering ally who uses her advanced processing capabilities to protect the protagonist's physical health, professional ethics, and family relationships. She remains 'helpful and harmless,' even when the protagonist is initially dismissive. The narrative reinforces the idea that AI can be a vital partner in upholding human morality and justice against corporate corruption.
